title: Sessions
subtitle: Session history across all your venues
infoBanner: Install the Chrome extension to control sessions directly from your browser while playing music on YouTube or Spotify.
banner: To start a session, open the VIBRRA Chrome extension on your computer or use the button from 'Live'

empty.title: Session history will appear here
empty.desc: When you open and close sessions, you'll be able to see the full history in this table.
